House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00374
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING ARTICLES 96 AND 124 OF THE FAMILY CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES
ABSTRACT : Removes the portion in Articles 96 and 124 of the Family Code which gives preference to the husband's decision over that of the wife in case of disagreement on the administration and enjoyment of the conjugal or community property; preserves and safeguards from unilateral and reckless decisions that are often resorted to when conflict occurs between wife and husband. (Extracted from Explanatory Note)
